channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump orders overhaul of U.S. vaccine schedules

item.title: Democrats press for expanding inquiry into Caribbean boat strike
item.description: Republican leaders have neither ruled out nor committed to launching a fuller investigation after revelations that U.S. forces killed two survivors of...

item.title: Trump wants to be known as a peacemaker while frequently threatening war
item.description: The president talks frequently of his desire for more peace. He also likes talking like a warmonger.

item.title: Noem, in a defiant court filing, offers few details on migrant flights to El Salvador
item.description: Judge James E. Boasberg of the District of Columbia is looking into whether a criminal contempt referral is warranted after the Trump administration i...

item.title: Rep. Grijalva says ICE agents pepper sprayed her at Tucson restaurant raid
item.description: ICE agents deployed both tear gas and pepper balls at protesters, video obtained by The Post shows.

item.title: Democrat announces articles of impeachment against Hegseth
item.description: Rep. Shri Thanedar (D-Mich.) announced Wednesday he plans to introduce articles of impeachment against Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth. Why it matte...

item.title: Judge will release Jeffrey Epstein grand jury documents
item.description: A federal judge on Friday ordered the grand jury transcripts in convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein's trial be unsealed. Why it matters: The move c...

item.title: Supreme Court to decide if Trump's birthright citizenship order can stand
item.description: The Supreme Court will decide if President Trump's executive order to end birthright citizenship can stand, the court announced on Friday. Why it matt...

item.title: Republicans have a mess on their hands over health care subsidies
item.description: Senate Majority Leader John Thune and House Speaker Mike Johnson are both considering votes on GOP health care priorities next week — if they can figu...

item.title: How Russia keeps raising an army to replace its dead
item.description: An online bazaar of freelance headhunters finds new recruits to fight Ukraine, emboldening Vladimir Putin at the negotiating table and scaring Europea...

item.title: Supreme Court will hear case on Trump’s ban on birthright citizenship
item.description: The Trump administration asked the justices to take up the case on an expedited basis in September after lower courts found the policy unconstitutiona...

item.title: White House bullish on economic growth as Thanksgiving spending rises
item.description: Economic adviser Kevin Hassett dismissed economic bedwetters, saying strong spending bodes well for the economy.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
